`Registered Attendees (31)`

On October 10, 2025, **R-Ladies Rome** hosted **BNPL and Machine Learning: Decisions That Scale**, a session led by [Kelly Marques](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kelly-marques-de-oliveiralopes/), data scientist and researcher in financial technology and applied machine learning.

##  📊 Talk Overview

In this engaging presentation, Kelly guided us through how **machine learning models** are transforming decision-making in the Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) landscape. She demonstrated live **Python code examples**, showing how predictive models can provide fast, scalable, and reliable assessments of user creditworthiness — even when traditional credit data is limited.

Beyond the technical side, the talk also explored the ethical and inclusive dimensions of algorithmic credit scoring, emphasizing transparency, fairness, and access in financial decision-making.

## 🧠 What You’ll Learn

- How to build and evaluate ML models for BNPL credit scoring
- Ways to handle high-volatility and short-term behavioral data
- The role of ethics, inclusion, and fairness in financial ML models
- Practical Python code demonstrations for end-to-end modeling

🔊 About the Speaker

[Kelly Marques]() is a data scientist from São Paulo (Brazil) specializing in machine learning for finance. With a strong background in predictive analytics and model ethics, she focuses on developing scalable, transparent, and human-centered AI systems for real-world applications.
